```{r}
#| label: xml_links

source("Oversigt over xml links.R")

aar <- params$aar

valg_dato <- xml_link_oversigt %>% 
  filter(aar == .env$aar & valg == "EP") %>% 
  slice(1) %>% 
  pull(xml_link) %>% 
  read_xml() %>% 
  xml_find_all("ValgDato") %>% 
  xml_text() %>% 
  dmy()

fintael <- valg_dato < today("Europe/Copenhagen")

if(fintael){
  type <- "fintælling"
} else {
  type <- "valgaften"
}

ep_xml <- xml_link_oversigt %>% 
  filter(aar == .env$aar & valg == "EP") %>% 
  filter(type == .env$type) %>% 
  pull(xml_link)


```
